resources.string: Using NFC, you can easily print or scan from the machine in front of you. (Please turn on NFC on your Android device before use.)
Find this mark on your machine.
In iPrint&Scan, prepare your document for printing or scanning.
Select NFC Printer or Scanner in the settings and press back.
Hold your device over the mark and tap the screen.
The machine will start to print or scan automatically.

You need to sign in to your Google account to print from Google Drive and to use the remote print / email print functions. The remote print function uses Google Cloud Print and it enables you to print from wherever you are.
You need to sign in to your %1$s account to print from %2$s.
If you sign out, you will not be able to print from %s.
Recalled print settings for this Wi-Fi access point.
Preparing to print. You can move your mobile device away from the machine.
Printing in progress. You can move your mobile device away from the machine.
Hold your device over the NFC mark and tap the screen.
Please turn on NFC on your Android device before use.\n
Slide the bar to select the Density.
A page feed (Roll paper with mark)
Connecting by Wi-Fi Direct. Please follow instructions displayed on your machine to certify the selected device.
The selected device has been connected by Wi-Fi Direct.
Recalled scan settings for this Wi-Fi access point.
Preparing to scan. You can move your mobile device away from the machine.
Scanning in progress. You can move your mobile device away from the machine.
Wi-Fi is off or not connected.\nWould you like to enter the Wi-Fi setup?
Please confirm the following:\n-Wi-Fi is off or not connected.\n-Turn your machine off and then on again, then try again.
Please confirm the following:\n-Check that the machine and the Android device are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.\n

-Check that the Wi-Fi access point/router's "Privacy Separator" option is "Disabled".
-Turn your machine off and then on again, then try again.
Make sure Wi-Fi is on and your device is connected.

If you are still having problems: tap "Set Manually" and enter your machine's IP address. You can find the IP address in your machine's Network menu.

\n-If your Brother machine supports NFC, you can print or scan by placing your Android device next to the NFC logo in the machine and tapping the image. Tap the information menu to see more NFC Information.
Please create some space on the card by deleting unwanted files.
Please open the ADF cover and remove any jammed paper, then try again.
No document detected in ADF (Automatic Document Feeder). \n\nPlease put a document in the ADF and try again.
Cover is open. Please close the cover, then try again.
After the current operation is completed, please try again.
If the device has jobs stored in memory, please wait until these jobs are completed or delete any remaining jobs and then try again.
Only Web Pages can be shared.
The scanned image has not been saved
The image will be deleted if you continue. Would you like to continue?
The previewed image has not been printed
The image will be deleted if you continue. Would you like to continue?
Cannot communicate with the device. Please check the device status.\n\nWould you like to continue to print?
No response. Brother iPrint&Scan will be terminated.
Scanned image cannot be saved.\nPlease confim that a memory card is installed.
2-sided scanning can only be used for documents up to Legal size.\nPlease cancel 2-sided scanning or change the document size setting in your application.
This file is in an unsupported format.
File size is too large.\nYou can print a document that is less than %s for this file type.
File size is too large.\nYou can print a document that is up to %d pages for this file type.
This function is not available in your region.
Failed to preview the pages below.\n\nPage:
Tap OK to go to iPrint&Scan, then wait until the current print job has finished before trying again.
Are you sure you want to delete all the items in the history list
Are you sure you want to delete this history?
Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
Your E-mail account is invalid or incorrect.\nPlease verify your login.
Remove the document from ADF Output Tray.
Press the Stop button on the machine to clear the error.
If the device is off, please turn it on. Also make sure the network settings are configured correctly.
This device is off or not supported.
Bluetooth is off.\nWould you like to turn on Bluetooth?
The HTML email you are trying to open is too large. It will be displayed as a plain text email only.
Please check the secure function lock settings with your system administrator.
You have reached the maximum number of prints allowed. Please check the secure function lock settings with your system administrator.
Please check the Memory Security settings with your system administrator.
Please check the Memory Security settings with your system administrator.
The Current settings are not supported by your Brother machine. Please confirm the paper size/document size setting etc. are correct.
Please check the secure function lock settings with your system administrator.
To scan documents larger\nthan 4\"x6\"(10x15cm), Please close\nthe Card Output Tray.
To scan documents that Photo L and 4\"x6\"(10x15cm), please open the Card Output Tray.

Unable to send the data because your Android device was not close enough to the NFC Logo on the machine.\nPlease touch the image again, keeping your Android device next to the NFC Logo on the machine until printing starts.

Unable to send the data because your Android device was not close enough to the NFC Logo on the machine.\nPlease touch the image again, keeping your Android device next to the NFC Logo on the machine until scanning starts.
NFC connection failed. Turn your Brother machine Off and then On and try again. Also, check your Android device is fully charged.
The Android device has been setup as a WiFi Direct Client. Please set WiFi Direct to OFF and try again.
Another device is already connected.Try again later.
Using this function is available with the screen of Print Preview/Scan only. And it is not available during processing document.
A connection to the internet is required for printing PDF and Office files. Please connect your Android device and the machine to a Wi-Fi network with an Internet connection.
Please turn Wi-Fi Direct OFF, and try again.
Unable to scan from the ADF in the document size chosen. Place your document on the scanner glass.
To print using NFC, please select NFC Printer in the Print Settings. Do you want to show the Print Settings?
To scan using NFC, please select NFC Scanner in the Scan Settings. Do you want to show the Scan Settings?
To print using NFC, please turn on NFC on your mobile device.
To scan using NFC, please turn on NFC on your mobile device.
If paper size is set to \"Legal\" turn off 2-sided print, and then try again.
You must register your printer with Google Cloud Print. For more information tap Support to download and see the Google Cloud Print Guide.

Check your brother machine is turned on and connected to the network.\nWhen \"Continue\" is selected, the print job will be saved on the Google Cloud Print server and will be printed when the printer becomes \"Online\".
Selected printer has been removed from Google Cloud Print. Select another printer.
This printer can not be selected. Select another printer.
Do not open the top cover when scanning a card.
Close the top cover before scanning a card.
Do not insert a card while scanning a document.
There is no card in the card slot.
A card is jammed in the card slot. Please open the Top/Front cover and remove the jammed card by pulling it backwards, then try again.
No print data selected. Select the data you want to print and try again.
Please confirm the following:\n-If the device is off, please turn it on. Also make sure the network settings are configured correctly.
This Brother Machine does not support printing or scanning by NFC connection.
The Wi-Fi Direct connection failed. Please try again.
Please check your %s account settings and try again.
Download failed, the memory is full. Delete unnecessary files from the device and try again.
Check the File/Folder exists in %s and try again.
There are too many files in this folder to display the contents. Delete any unnecessary files and try again.
Please check the note and try again.
Check the file exists in Evernote and try again.
The contents of the Note cannot be accessed.
This service is not supported on your device. You can not use this service.
End-User License Agreement for Brother software

IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ CAREFULLY: This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and Brother Industries, Ltd. ("Brother"), which governs your use of the Brother software that will be installed if you review this EULA and accept on the screen ("SOFTWARE"). If you agree to be legally bound by the terms of this EULA, you may use the Software in accordance with the terms of this EULA. If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, you obtain no license to the SOFTWARE. In such case, you may not use the SOFTWARE.


Terms and Conditions.

1. Ownership.
All right, title and interest in and to the SOFTWARE (including all copyright and other intellectual property rights therein) and the materials associated therewith ("Documentation") are owned by Brother or its suppliers. The SOFTWARE is licensed but not sold. In addition, the SOFTWARE includes various Open-source Software program ("Open-source components"). As for detail about Open-source components, please refer to the terms and conditions separately defined.

2. Grant of License.
2.1 Brother grants you a non-exclusive license to install and use the copy of the SOFTWARE on your devices, to the extent necessary for intended use of Brother's products (including, but not limited to printers and multi-functional products) for which such SOFTWARE will be used ("Brother Machine").
2.2 Brother further grants you a license to make one copy only of the SOFTWARE solely for archival and back-up purposes. Any such copy shall also reproduce all copyright and intellectual property right notices from the original.
2.3 Other than as expressly permitted by Sections 2.1 and 2.2 above, or where you have a right at law to do so (and such right cannot lawfully be excluded) you may not (i) make any copies of the SOFTWARE or Documentation (ii) modify the SOFTWARE or Documentation (iii) reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile or use the SOFTWARE or Documentation to create any derivative work, or (iv) rent, sub-license, transfer (other than in accordance with Section 3) or lease the SOFTWARE.

3. Transfer.
You may permanently transfer the SOFTWARE to any person, provided that when you transfer the SOFTWARE, you must also transfer and deliver to such person any upgrades and all Documentation provided to you by or on behalf of Brother and, provided also that such person confirms to Brother its acceptance of this EULA with respect to such Software and Documentation. Notwithstanding the foregoing, you must not deliver to such person any copy of the SOFTWARE made by you in accordance with Section 2.2. Upon transfer, you must erase all copies of the SOFTWARE made by you and/or which are contained on any devices within your possession or under your control. The warranty is not transferable.

4. WARRANTIES DISCLAIMER.
TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY LAW, THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED TO YOU "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER ORAL OR WRITTEN, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. BROTHER SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

5. Limitation of Liability.
IN NO EVENT SHALL BROTHER BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS, LOSS OF BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES, LOSS OF USE OF DATA, INTERRUPTION OF BUSINESS, OR FOR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE, EXEMPLARY OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, ARISING OUT OF THE USE, INABILITY TO USE, OR THE RESULTS OF USE OF THE SOFTWARE, WHETHER BASED IN CONTRACT, TORT, OR OTHERWISE. YOUR USE OF THE SOFTWARE IS ENTIRELY AT YOUR OWN RISK. SHOULD THE SOFTWARE PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE ENTIRE COST OF ALL SERVICE, REPAIR OR CORRECTION AND, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY THE APPLICABLE LAW, YOU AGREE TO UNCONDITIONALLY WAIVE ALL STATUTORY OR OTHER RIGHTS THAT MAY BE HELD BY YOU AGAINST BROTHER IN RESPECT OF SUCH DEFECT.
Notwithstanding the above, these terms do not purport to limit the statutory rights of a consumer that cannot be waived under the applicable law.

6. Cost, charge incurred for your use of the SOFTWARE
You agree and understand that service(s) available by the SOFTWARE may be provided through any network communication and any cloud server as operated by Brother (“Server”), and therefore, during the course of your using this SOFTWARE (e.g. data conversion such as PDF to other data format), any communication charge due to utilization of such network and Server will occur, and you shall bear such charge.
In addition to the above charge, you are solely responsible for any costs or expenses incurred by you in connection with your use of the SOFTWARE.
In no event shall Brother reimburse you for any above charge, costs or expenses.

7. The third party’s service.
This SOFTWARE utilizes Google Cloud Print provided by Google Inc.. When you use the Google Cloud Print, you need to login Google Cloud Print with your valid Google Account and register the Brother Machine on Google Cloud Print.
You need to agree the terms and conditions provided by Google Inc. and use Google Cloud Print in accordance with such terms.
You shall acknowledge that it is your own responsibility to constantly secure enough volume or space to store your files and data in Google Cloud Print and other third party services and applications you desire to use with this SOFTWARE. Brother shall not be construed in any way that it has a responsibility to secure such volume or space to store your files and data, even if you do not have enough volume or space when you attempt to transfer your files and data to or from those third party services.
Brother shall not be liable for any errors, losses and damages incurred to you and your properties, whether visible or invisible, arisen by connection of the SOFTWARE with Google Cloud Print and other third party services and applications (including but not limited to cloud storage services such as Dropbox or OneDrive), including but not limited to losses or damages caused to files and data when you have attempted to upload or transfer those items to or from other third party services or application, the loss or damages to the personal information you may provide to such third parties, or any errors or damages caused to your computers, hardware devices, or other software you use.

8. Connection of SOFTWARE and Brother Machine.
You shall acknowledge that when you connect the SOFTWARE and the on-line Brother Machine, you may be required to change the settings of routers and input certain IP address, valid Google Account and passwords. Brother shall not be liable for any troubles, disputes, and related damages incurred when you attempt to connect the SOFTWARE to on-line Brother Machine owned, managed, or in control by you or any other third parties.

9. Term and Termination.
This EULA will become effective upon your acceptance and shall continue in effect unless you transfer the SOFTWARE in accordance with the EULA and the transferee undertakes to Brother to be bound by this EULA with respect to the SOFTWARE.
However, Brother may terminate this EULA without notice if you breach any of its provisions.

10. Export Regulations.
You may not export or re-export the SOFTWARE or any copy or adaptation thereof in violation of any applicable laws or regulations.

11. Governing Laws.
This EULA is governed by the laws of Japan and Japanese Courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction with respect to this EULA except with regard to enforcement in which case the jurisdiction of the Japanese Courts shall be non-exclusive.

12. Illegality.
If any of the provisions of this EULA shall be declared illegal or unenforceable in whole or in part, such provisions shall be severable and independent from the other provisions of this EULA, and the validity of the other provisions and of the entire EULA shall not be affected.

13. Third Party Rights.
The provisions of this EULA are intended only to have effect between Brother and yourself and are not intended to confer any benefit or right of enforcement upon any other person. 

14. Personal License.
The rights granted by Brother hereunder are personal to you and you shall not be permitted to assign, transfer or otherwise make over to any third party the SOFTWARE (or the Documentation) or the benefit or burden of this EULA or any of the rights granted hereunder other than as expressly permitted by Section 3.
The SOFTWARE includes following software (including but not limited to the Open-source Software). Brother utilizes this software in accordance with the terms and conditions below.

Thank you for using iPrint&Scan. In order to keep improving the app, we would like to periodically collect anonymous usage information. Your cooperation will help us provide you with new features and an improved user experience.

This privacy policy governs your use of the Brother iPrint&Scan mobile application (“Software”) provided by Brother Industries, Ltd. (“Brother” or “Our”). When you prepare to print certain types of files through the Software, such files will be automatically sent to Our server (“Server”), converted into printable format files, and then sent back to your mobile device. Any and all files sent to the Server will be automatically deleted within a short period of time after such conversion. There is no storage capability in the Server. Except for such conversion purpose, Brother will not store or use any such files without your prior consent.

Device Information and Google Analytics
a) Device Information
When you use the Software, information about your mobile device and printer (“Device”) or how you use the Software (collectively “Device Information”), such as printer model, regional information, firmware, use of each function of the Software, printer status etc. may be recorded in Our Server. Device Information (except for the serial number) cannot be used in itself or in combination with any other information we may have to identify you as a person. We reserve the right to use such information solely for the improvement of the Software or any other products/services of Brother, our marketing/research activities, product planning or any other related activities for Our customer’s benefits (collectively “Purposes”). We will not use your Device Information other than for the Purposes without your prior consent. We may disclose your Device Information to third parties in an anonymous format solely for achieving the Purposes, and always by obliging such third parties to control such information as confidential.

Device Information includes the serial number of your printer. The serial number can be associated with the data which you might register to our sales company’s product registration website. However, we will not use the Serial Number to identify you or other than for the Purposes. Serial Number may be stored in Our Server located in countries without an adequate level of protection for personal data compared to that in your country, but we will control the Serial Number in strict accordance with Brother’s “Privacy Policy for Collection of Device Information” which is available at Brother’s Website <www.brother.com/rd/privacy/>.

b) Use of Google Analytics
The Software uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics collects traffic data using “cookies.” The data collected is used to analyze and help us understand how you use the Software. For more information about how Google handles your information, please see 
< http://www.google.com/analytics/learn/privacy.html>.
By using Google Analytics, Google and Brother collects non-personally identifiable information such as which printer model you use, how you use the Software, and how you navigate through the Software. Brother will only use the information for the Purposes.

By validating “Send Information”, you will be deemed to have consented to the sending of Device Information to Brother Server under above conditions and the use of Google Analytics. Even if you do not consent to it, you will still be able to use the full functionality of the Software.
